items.title: Wes Moore, Tim Walz urge for a fiercer Democratic party at famed Jim Clyburn Fish Fry
items.description: Both governors have denied any plans of seeking the presidential nomination.

items.title: Boulder attack suspect in US illegally: Homeland Security
items.description: The man suspected of carrying out an "act of terrorism" on a pedestrian mall in Boulder, Colorado, is in the United States illegally.

items.title: Istanbul peace talks resume as Russia reels from surprise Ukraine drone attack
items.description: Ukrainian and Russian delegations met again in Istanbul, Turkey, on Monday to take part in the next round of U.S.-brokered peace talks.

items.title: WATCH:  New Seattle Mariners player picks up walk-off win in major league debut

items.title: Supreme Court won't hear challenge to Maryland assault weapons ban
items.description: The Supreme Court is declining to hear a challenge to state bans on assault weapons, semi-automatic rifles that are popular among gun owners and have ...
